title: Reaper
description: My dead best friend's daughter and the woman that haunts my dreams are one and the same.For the last two years, I've told myself sheâ€™s off limits.That a man like me, can't be with a woman her age.Then my little maniac turned eighteen.And I gave in to my temptation.I shouldn't have, but now it's too late.She's mine now, and I'll never let her go.Then one of the biggest sinners in Vegas thought he could just take her.He's forgetting It's my job to protect her. Mine.Now, I'm going to burn this city to the ground.I'll reap havoc until my little maniac is back in my arms.
author: K.L. Savage
